name: df-lp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(clp, cmpt(s0, ctop, cmpt(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), cab(s2, wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(s0)), cdif(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2)))))))))
comment: Define a function on topologies whose value is the set of limit points of the subsets of the base set. See ~ lpval . (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-2007.)
